Para corrigir os symlinks em outros projetos, rode este script na raiz de cada projeto afetado:

**PowerShell (Windows):**

```powershell
# Remover symlinks quebrados
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# Recriar com caminhos corretos
$coreTarget = Resolve-Path ".copilot-core\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md"
$projectTarget = Resolve-Path ".copilot-project\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md"

New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Target $coreTarget -Force
New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Target $projectTarget -Force

# Verificar
Get-Item ".github\instructions\*" | Select-Object Name, LinkType, Target | Format-Table -AutoSize
```

**Bash/Zsh (Linux/Mac):**

```bash
# Remover symlinks quebrados
rm -f .github/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md
rm -f .github/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md

# Recriar com caminhos corretos
ln -s ../../.copilot-core/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md .github/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md
ln -s ../../.copilot-project/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md .github/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md

# Verificar
ls -la .github/instructions/
```

**Alternativa rÃ¡pida (copiar e colar):**

```powershell
# Windows - uma linha
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\*.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Target (Resolve-Path ".copilot-core\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md") -Force; New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Target (Resolve-Path ".copilot-project\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md") -Force
```

Rode isso em cada projeto que estÃ¡ com symlinks quebrados. O script detecta automaticamente os caminhos corretos e recria os symlinks.

response.generatedTitle: Analyzed fixing broken symlinks in projects

response.value:
Para corrigir os symlinks em outros projetos, rode este script na raiz de cada projeto afetado:

**PowerShell (Windows):**

```powershell
# Remover symlinks quebrados
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

# Recriar com caminhos corretos
$coreTarget = Resolve-Path ".copilot-core\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md"
$projectTarget = Resolve-Path ".copilot-project\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md"

New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Target $coreTarget -Force
New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Target $projectTarget -Force

# Verificar
Get-Item ".github\instructions\*" | Select-Object Name, LinkType, Target | Format-Table -AutoSize
```

**Bash/Zsh (Linux/Mac):**

```bash
# Remover symlinks quebrados
rm -f .github/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md
rm -f .github/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md

# Recriar com caminhos corretos
ln -s ../../.copilot-core/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md .github/instructions/agent-skills-core.instructions.md
ln -s ../../.copilot-project/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md .github/instructions/agent-skills-project.instructions.md

# Verificar
ls -la .github/instructions/
```

**Alternativa rÃ¡pida (copiar e colar):**

```powershell
# Windows - uma linha
Remove-Item ".github\instructions\*.md" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md" -Target (Resolve-Path ".copilot-core\instructions\agent-skills-core.instructions.md") -Force; New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink -Path ".github\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md" -Target (Resolve-Path ".copilot-project\instructions\agent-skills-project.instructions.md") -Force
```

Rode isso em cada projeto que estÃ¡ com symlinks quebrados. O script detecta automaticamente os caminhos corretos e recria os symlinks.
